column2: Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Juuni Kyuu-hen - Yomigaerishi Gold Saint-tachi no Shinwa
Is a summary of the Saga Hades Sanctuary from the perspective of the golden knights resurrected, especially Shura, Camus and Saga.
['Gemini, Saga', 'Aquarius, Camus', 'Aries, Muu', 'Capricorn, Shura', 'Phoenix, Ikki', 'Dragon, Shiryuu', 'Pegasus, Seiya', 'Virgo, Shaka', 'Andromeda, Shun', 'Cygnus, Hyouga']
[['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', 'Director'], ['Matsuzawa, Yumi', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Kurumada, Masami', 'Original Creator'], ['Baroli, Hermes', 'ADR Director']]
